comments.author: igor@mir2.org
comments.body:
Created attachment 156844
Fix + consistent parser error message syntax

description:
This is Rhino version of bug 256617 against SpiderMonkey:

Rhino accepts 
throw 
<throw-expression>

as a valid throw declaration while ECMAscript states that <eol> is not allowed
before throw-expression.
summary: throw statement: eol should not be allowed
